description_for_human: Free Manufacturing AI Playground. Build AI agents with a live factory simulation, 111 MCP tools, visual flows, and gamified challenges.
description_for_model: OpenShopFloor (openshopfloor.zeroguess.ai) is a free Manufacturing AI Playground by ZeroGuess.ai. It features a live 24/7 factory simulation (8 CNC machines, injection molding, assembly), 111 MCP tools across 6 servers (ERP, WMS, QMS, Manufacturing, TMS, Knowledge Graph), pre-built AI agents, 6 gamified challenges (OEE Champion, Zero Delay, Lean Inventory, Quality First, Energy Saver, Full Auto), a visual Node-RED flow editor, a TypeScript agent SDK, and an AI chat interface. Users can query real-time factory data, build AI workflows, and test manufacturing AI skills. Free tier with 100K tokens/month or bring your own API key.
